songs.title: Location
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
La música de Harry Fraud
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Chorus]
Yeah, what, what
You cannot hop in my car
Bentley coupe riding with stars (Yeah, what, what)
I keep a Glock like a cop (Ayy, yeah)
She give the top in the drop (Yeah, ayy)
Diamonds they wet on my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms
Diamonds they wet on my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms
Diamonds they wet on my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms

[Interlude]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
What, yeah, what, what, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Tats on my neck and my arm
Tats on my neck and my, uh

[Verse]
Uh, ooh, in this bitch going crazy
Uh, yeah, I'm with this shit like a baby
Uh, yeah, yeah, I fuck yo bitch, she my baby
Yeah, yeah, I treat yo bitch like my lady
Uh, uh, shawty bend back like the Matrix
Curge whip it up like the 80s
I'm in the kitchen, go crazy
I just want me a Mercedes
Pull up we totin' .380s
Pull up I sent the location
Pull up I sent the location

[Chorus]
Yeah, what, what
You cannot hop in my car
Bentley coupe riding with stars (Yeah, what, what)
I keep a Glock like a cop (Ayy, yeah)
She give the top in the drop (Yeah, ayy)
Diamonds they wet on my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms
Diamonds they wet on my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms
Diamonds they wet on my arms
Tats on my neck and my arms

[Outro]
Tats on my neck and my arm, tats on my neck and my arm
Tats on my neck and my arm, tats on my neck and my arm
Tats on my neck and my arm, tats on my neck and my arm
